Aerva lanata.description: Aerva lanata, commonly known as 'Chakra' or 'Indian Cotton', is a medicinal plant found in tropical regions.
Aerva lanata.uses: Used in traditional medicine for various purposes including treating fever, and skin diseases.

Amaranthus spinosus123.description: Spiny Amaranth is a weed that is commonly found in disturbed soils and gardens.
Amaranthus spinosus123.uses: Traditionally used in folk medicine and also as a food source in some cultures.

Calotropis plant123.description: A plant species widely used in traditional medicine for its analgesic properties.
Calotropis plant123.uses: Used in traditional medicine to treat ailments like fever, wounds, and inflammation.

Chinee apple.description: Chinee apple is a species of invasive plant known for its rapid spread.
Chinee apple.uses: Used in some cultures for medicinal purposes, although considered invasive.

Cleome viscosa.description: Cleome viscosa is a wildflower that can be found in tropical and subtropical areas.
Cleome viscosa.uses: Has medicinal properties and is used in traditional medicine in some cultures.

Cyprus rotundus.description: A perennial weed commonly found in agricultural fields, gardens, and grasslands.
Cyprus rotundus.uses: Has medicinal properties and is used in some regions for treating digestive disorders.

Datura.description: Datura is a genus of poisonous plants, often used in traditional medicine.
Datura.uses: Although toxic, it is used in some regions for its psychoactive properties.

Lantana.description: A shrub widely distributed in tropical and subtropical areas, commonly found in gardens.
Lantana.uses: Used as a decorative plant but can also be toxic to animals.

Martynia Annua111.description: Martynia Annua is a plant native to the Americas, often used in folk medicine.
Martynia Annua111.uses: Used for medicinal purposes and as an ornamental plant.

Parkinsonia.description: A shrub native to the southwestern United States and Mexico.
Parkinsonia.uses: Used in traditional medicine for its anti-inflammatory properties.

Parthenium.description: A highly invasive weed, considered toxic to humans and livestock.
Parthenium.uses: Despite its toxicity, it is sometimes used in traditional medicine.

Phyllanthus nirur.description: Known as the stonebreaker, it's used to treat kidney stones.
Phyllanthus nirur.uses: Widely used in traditional medicine for its diuretic and liver-protecting effects.

Prickly acacia.description: A tree species that is invasive in some regions.
Prickly acacia.uses: Used for its medicinal properties and as timber.

Pycerus polystachyos.description: A species of sedge native to tropical regions.
Pycerus polystachyos.uses: Used in traditional crafting and in some herbal medicines.

Rubber vine.description: An invasive plant known for its rapid spread across landscapes.
Rubber vine.uses: The sap has been traditionally used in various cultures for medicinal purposes.

Siam weed.description: An invasive weed that has become a problem in tropical and subtropical areas.
Siam weed.uses: Sometimes used for its medicinal properties but considered harmful to biodiversity.

Snake weed.description: A weed commonly found in tropical areas.
Snake weed.uses: Used in folk medicine to treat a variety of ailments.

Sorghum halepense.description: An invasive species often found in fields and along roadsides.
Sorghum halepense.uses: Used as fodder in some regions but can be toxic in large amounts.

Taraxacum officinale.description: A common weed found in lawns and fields.
Taraxacum officinale.uses: Used in herbal medicine for its detoxifying properties.

Trianthema portulacastrum.description: A groundcover weed commonly found in warm climates.
Trianthema portulacastrum.uses: Used as groundcover in some landscaping applications.

Tridax procumbens.description: A plant commonly found in tropical and subtropical regions.
Tridax procumbens.uses: Used in herbal medicine for its wound-healing properties.

Xanthium strumarium.description: A weed commonly found in agricultural fields and disturbed soils.
Xanthium strumarium.uses: Has medicinal properties and is sometimes used to treat certain diseases.

abutilon hirtum123.uses: Used in some regions for its fibers and medicinal properties.

digitaria sanguinalis.description: A common grass weed found in lawns and agricultural fields.
